title: Crossing the Divide: A Family Adventure Along the Continental Divide
description: This is a compelling story of a historical family event.Three generations participated in one man's 3,800 mile walk along North America's Continental Divide from Mexico to Jasper, Alberta, Canada.Richard and Gaila Mallery tell the story from the dual perspective of the backcountry and front country. Most long-distance hikers leave their families for months to pursue their passion for the trail. This is a story of how one family took a different path--one that allowed them to enjoy the adventure together.
author: Richard Mallery
